description: The Men's Arch Rock Convertible Pant gives you options—great for hiking, camping, or those who are perennially indecisive. Articulated knees, a crotch gusset, and an elasticated waistband makes these hiking pants easy to wear under a backpack belt or with a harness, and UPF 50 keeps you protected when the sun comes out midway through the day.
name: Marmot Arch Rock Convertible Pants, Reg - Mens
